root.title: PowerShell Get-Process LSASS in ScriptBlock
root.description: Detects a Get-Process command on lsass process, which is in almost all cases a sign of malicious activity
root.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

logsource.definition: Requirements: Script Block Logging must be enabled

falsepositives.item: Legitimate certificate exports invoked by administrators or users (depends on processes in the environment - filter if unusable)
